text: Antonius Martinus “Ati” Graaumans (born 3 December 1945) is a former Dutch football defender. He played for NAC Breda and the Belgian club KFC Wuustwezel. In May 1969, a week before his marriage, he got injured within the first minutes in the match against GVAV and had to go to the hospital because of a 25 cm long deep cut. His nephew Ad Graaumans also played for NAC Breda. ==References== == Other websites == * newspaper articles of Graaumans via Delpher Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from North Brabant Category:Association football defenders
title: Ati Graaumans
